title: LHC Group completes acquisition of Georgia hospice company
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Business - Today 
LHC Group Inc., a Louisiana-based home health and hospice company, will acquire Georgia-based Halcyon Hospice LLC and its 16 facilities for ...
